song_lyric:
作曲 : 方大同
 作词 : 方大同/崔惟楷
你总愿意陪我宅
我没梗你一样开怀
你热了我喜欢的菜
默契 都在 不需要猜
You感动很直接 笑着看世界
给我不同视野
我的知觉 被你制约
想跟你分享喜怒哀乐每个日夜

These are the ten reasons why I love you
一二三四五六七八九十
These are the ten reasons why
Oh 爱 爱 ten reasons why
爱你 girl I just wanna say I love you
You are everything and everything‘s about you
Ten reasons Ten reasons why I love you

你习惯用温柔 让平凡的生活 充满爱
你小小的耍赖 也互相的依赖
everyday everyday像初恋般精彩
谢谢你把我当唯一 回忆在细节里堆积
一直重复温习着 你的好 你的美丽

These are the ten reasons why I love you
一二三四五六七八九十
These are the ten reasons why
Oh 爱 爱 ten reasons why
爱你 girl I just wanna say I love you
You are everything and everything‘s about you
Ten reasons Ten reasons why I love you

我想保持这样 就爱你这样
在一起很舒服的状态love it
不用刻意放闪示爱 (也明白)
心有灵犀就很自在
不说话也愉快 避风的安全地带
这引力太厉害 闭上眼不想离开
两颗心连起来
And it‘s stronger than wi-fi
Never get disconnected

These are the ten reasons why I love you
一二三四五六七八九十
These are the ten reasons why
Oh 爱 爱 ten reasons why
爱你 girl I just wanna say I love you
You are everything and everything‘s about you
Ten reasons Ten reasons why I love you

These are the ten reasons
一二三四五六七八九十
These are the ten reasons why
Ten reasons why
爱你  ten reasons why
You are everything and everything‘s about you
These are the ten reasons why , ten reasons
